name: minecraft-server
description: This docker image provides a Minecraft Server that will automatically download the latest stable version at startup.

paths.name: Server Data
paths.description: Minecraft world data, configuration files and plugins.

ports.name: MC_PORT
ports.description: Main Minecraft server port for player connections.

ports.name: RCON_PORT
ports.description: RCON port for remote server administration.

variables.name: EULA
variables.description: Accept Minecraft EULA (must be TRUE to start server).

variables.name: Server Type
variables.description: Server type (VANILLA, PAPER, FORGE, FABRIC, etc.).

variables.name: Memory
variables.description: Maximum memory allocation for the server (e.g., 2G, 4G, 12G).
